tidbits.title: Breathtaking Landscapes
tidbits.description: New Zealand offers diverse and breathtaking landscapes, from fjords and mountains to beautiful beaches and lush forests.

tidbits.title: Maori Culture
tidbits.description: The Maori culture is integral to New Zealand's identity, seen in art, performances like the haka, and the preservation of traditions.

tidbits.title: Adventure and Outdoor Activities
tidbits.description: The country is a haven for adventure seekers, offering activities like hiking, bungee jumping, skiing, and exploring geothermal areas.
